name: MajorDepressiveDisorderActive
title: Major Depressive Disorder Active
purpose: (Clinical Focus: The purpose of this value set is to represent concepts for diagnoses of active major depressive disorders.),(Data Element Scope: This value set may use a model element related to Diagnosis or an Encounter diagnosis.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes concepts that represent a diagnosis of major depressive disorder including both single and recurrent episodes with any level of severity.),(Exclusion Criteria: Excludes concepts that represent major depressive disorders in full remission.)
